-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | StackExchange API interface
--   
--   Provides interface for StackExchange v2.1 API
@package libstackexchange
@version 0.3.0.0


-- | StackExchange API request manipulation routines
module Network.StackExchange.Request
type Request a n r = Dual (Endo (R a n r))

-- | StackExchange API Request data type.
--   
--   <tt>a</tt> is a phantom type showing whether authentication is enabled
--   
--   <tt>n</tt> is a phantom type dissallowing combination of different API
--   calls in one request
--   
--   <tt>r</tt> is a type of parsed API call result
data R (a :: Auth) (n :: Symbol) r
R :: Text -> Text -> Text -> Map Text Text -> Maybe (ByteString -> r) -> R r

-- | API host link
_host :: R r -> Text

-- | API call link
_path :: R r -> Text

-- | API call method (GET/POST)
_method :: R r -> Text

-- | API call query parameters
_query :: R r -> Map Text Text

-- | API call result parsing function
_parse :: R r -> Maybe (ByteString -> r)

-- | Authentication
data Auth

-- | Request requires auth_token
RequireToken :: Auth

-- | Request may be sent without auth_token
Ready :: Auth

-- | SE response value wrapper
newtype SE (a :: Object)
SE :: Value -> SE
unSE :: SE -> Value

-- | SE response type
data Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/access-token</a>
AccessToken :: Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/account-merge</a>
AccountMerge :: Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/answer</a>
Answer :: Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/badge</a>
Badge :: Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/comment</a>
Comment :: Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/error</a>
Error :: Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/event</a>
Event :: Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/filter</a>
Filter :: Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/inbox-item</a>
InboxItem :: Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/info</a>
Info :: Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/network-user</a>
NetworkUser :: Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/notification</a>
Notification :: Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/post</a>
Post :: Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/privilege</a>
Privilege :: Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/question</a>
Question :: Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/question-timeline</a>
QuestionTimeline :: Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/reputation</a>
Reputation :: Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/reputation-history</a>
ReputationHistory :: Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/revision</a>
Revision :: Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/site</a>
Site :: Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/suggested-edit</a>
SuggestedEdit :: Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/tag</a>
Tag :: Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/tag-score</a>
TagScore :: Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/tag-synonym</a>
TagSynonym :: Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/tag-wiki</a>
TagWiki :: Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/top-tag</a>
TopTag :: Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/user</a>
User :: Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/user-timeline</a>
UserTimeline :: Object

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/types/write-permission</a>
WritePermission :: Object

-- | Request defining only API call host
--   
--   Primarily used in Auth, not intended for usage by library user
host :: Text -> Request a n r

-- | Request defining only API call path
--   
--   Primarily used in API call wrappers, not intended for usage by library
--   user
path :: Text -> Request a n r

-- | Request defining only call method
--   
--   Primarily used in API call wrappers, not intended for usage by library
--   user
method :: Text -> Request a n r

-- | Request defining only API call result parsing function
--   
--   Primarily used in API call wrappers, not intended for usage by library
--   user
parse :: (ByteString -> r) -> Request a n r

-- | Request defining only API call query parameters
--   
--   Rather low level interface. For more specific usage <a>site</a>,
--   <a>filter</a>, etc calls may be more convenient
--   
--   Takes a list of (key, value) parameters such as <tt>[("order", "asc"),
--   ("sort", "rank")]</tt>
query :: [(Text, Text)] -> Request a n r

-- | Convert token requiring Request into ready one
token :: Text -> Request RequireToken n r -> Request Ready n r

-- | Request defining only App key
key :: Text -> Request a n r

-- | Request defining only API call site query parameter
site :: Text -> Request a n r

-- | Request defining only API call filter query parameter
filter :: Text -> Request a n r

-- | Request defining only API call state query parameter
state :: Text -> Request a n r

-- | Scope defines permission granted for application by user
data Scope
ReadInbox :: Scope
NoExpiry :: Scope
WriteAccess :: Scope
PrivateInfo :: Scope

-- | Request defining only API call scope query parameter
scope :: [Scope] -> Request a n r

-- | Request defining only Authentication API call application id
--   
--   Primarily used in Authentication API call wrappers, not intended for
--   usage by library user
client :: Int -> Request a n r

-- | Request defining only Authentication API call redirect url
--   
--   Primarily used in Authentication API call wrappers, not intended for
--   usage by library user
redirectURI :: Text -> Request a n r

-- | Request defining only Authentication API call application secret
--   
--   Primarily used in Authentication API call wrappers, not intended for
--   usage by library user
secret :: Text -> Request a n r

-- | Request defining only Authentication API call code
--   
--   Primarily used in Authentication API call wrappers, not intended for
--   usage by library user
code :: Text -> Request a n r

-- | Wrapping to interesting <a>Monoid</a> (<a>R</a> -&gt; <a>R</a>)
--   instance
wrap :: (R a n r -> R a n r) -> Request a n r

-- | Unwrapping from interesting <a>Monoid</a> (<a>R</a> -&gt; <a>R</a>)
--   instance
unwrap :: Request a n r -> (R a n r -> R a n r)

-- | Render <a>R</a> as URI string for networking
render :: Request a n r -> String
instance Show (SE a)
instance FromJSON (SE a)
instance Default (R a n r)


-- | Get response from Request and retrieve data from it
module Network.StackExchange.Response

-- | StackExchange invalid response exception
data SEException
SEException :: ByteString -> String -> SEException

-- | Recieved data
_data :: SEException -> ByteString

-- | Parser/libstackexchange errors
_error :: SEException -> String

-- | Send Request and parse response
askSE :: Request Ready n r -> IO r

-- | Isomorphism for the ease of interaction with aeson-lens
se :: (Functor f, Profunctor p) => p (SE a) (f (SE t)) -> p (Maybe Value) (f (Maybe Value))
instance Typeable SEException
instance Show SEException
instance Exception SEException


-- | API methods list
module Network.StackExchange.API

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/read-access-tokens</a>
readAccessTokens :: [Text] -> Request a "readAccessTokens" [SE AccessToken]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/invalidate-access-tokens</a>
invalidateAccessTokens :: [Text] -> Request a "invalidateAccessTokens" [SE AccessToken]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/application-de-authenticate</a>
applicationDeAuthenticate :: [Text] -> Request a "applicationDeAuthenticate" [SE AccessToken]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/answers</a>
answers :: Request a "answers" [SE Answer]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/answers-by-ids</a>
answersByIds :: [Int] -> Request a "answersByIds" [SE Answer]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/answers-on-users</a>
answersOnUsers :: [Int] -> Request a "answersOnUsers" [SE Answer]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/answers-on-questions</a>
answersOnQuestions :: [Int] -> Request a "answersOnQuestions" [SE Answer]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/me-answers</a>
meAnswers :: Request RequireToken "meAnswers" [SE Answer]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/top-user-answers-in-tags</a>
topUserAnswersInTags :: Int -> [Text] -> Request a "topUserAnswersInTags" [SE Answer]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/me-tags-top-answers</a>
meTagsTopAnswers :: [Text] -> Request RequireToken "meTagsTopAnswers" [SE Answer]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/badges</a>
badges :: Request a "badges" [SE Badge]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/badges-by-ids</a>
badgesByIds :: [Int] -> Request a "badgesByIds" [SE Badge]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/badge-recipients-by-ids</a>
badgeRecipientsByIds :: [Int] -> Request a "badgeRecipientsByIds" [SE Badge]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/badges-by-name</a>
badgesByName :: Request a "badgesByName" [SE Badge]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/badge-recipients</a>
badgeRecipients :: Request a "badgeRecipients" [SE Badge]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/badges-by-tag</a>
badgesByTag :: Request a "badgesByTag" [SE Badge]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/badges-on-users</a>
badgesOnUsers :: [Int] -> Request a "badgesOnUsers" [SE Badge]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/me-badges</a>
meBadges :: Request RequireToken "meBadges" [SE Badge]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/comments-on-answers</a>
commentsOnAnswers :: [Int] -> Request a "commentsOnAnswers" [SE Comment]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/comments</a>
comments :: Request a "comments" [SE Comment]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/comments-by-ids</a>
commentsByIds :: [Int] -> Request a "commentsByIds" [SE Comment]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/delete-comment</a>
deleteComment :: Int -> Request RequireToken "deleteComment" ()

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/edit-comment</a>
editComment :: Int -> Text -> Request RequireToken "editComment" (SE Comment)

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/comments-on-posts</a>
commentsOnPosts :: [Int] -> Request a "commentsOnPosts" [SE Comment]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/create-comment</a>
createComment :: Int -> Text -> Request RequireToken "createComment" (SE Comment)

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/comments-on-questions</a>
commentsOnQuestions :: [Int] -> Request a "commentsOnQuestions" [SE Comment]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/comments-on-users</a>
commentsOnUsers :: [Int] -> Request a "commentsOnUsers" [SE Comment]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/me-comments</a>
meComments :: Request RequireToken "meComments" [SE Comment]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/comments-by-users-to-user</a>
commentsByUsersToUser :: [Int] -> Int -> Request a "commentsByUsersToUser" [SE Comment]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/me-comments-to</a>
meCommentsTo :: Int -> Request RequireToken "meCommentsTo" [SE Comment]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/mentions-on-users</a>
mentionsOnUsers :: [Int] -> Request a "mentionsOnUsers" [SE Comment]

meMentioned :: Request RequireToken "meMentioned" [SE Comment]

errors :: Request a "errors" [SE Error]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/events</a>
events :: Request RequireToken "events" [SE Event]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/create-filter</a>
createFilter :: [Text] -> [Text] -> Text -> Request a "createFilter" (SE Filter)

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/read-filter</a>
readFilter :: [Text] -> Request a "readFilter" [SE Filter]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/inbox</a>
inbox :: Request RequireToken "inbox" [SE InboxItem]

inboxUnread :: Request RequireToken "inboxUnread" [SE InboxItem]

tags :: Request a "tags" [SE Tag]

moderatorOnlyTags :: Request a "moderatorOnlyTags" [SE Tag]

requiredTags :: Request a "requiredTags" [SE Tag]

tagsByName :: [Text] -> Request a "tagsByName" [SE Tag]

relatedTags :: [Text] -> Request a "relatedTags" [SE Tag]

tagsOnUsers :: [Int] -> Request a "tagsOnUsers" [SE Tag]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/me-tags</a>
meTags :: Request RequireToken "meTags" [SE Tag]

topAnswerersOnTag :: Text -> Text -> Request a "topAnswerersOnTag" [SE TagScore]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/top-askers-on-tags</a>
topAskersOnTag :: Text -> Text -> Request a "topAskersOnTag" [SE TagScore]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/tag-synonyms</a>
tagSynonyms :: Request a "tagSynonyms" [SE TagSynonym]

synonymsByTags :: [Text] -> Request a "synonymsByTags" [SE TagSynonym]

wikisByTags :: [Text] -> Request a "wikisByTags" [SE TagWiki]

topAnswerTagsOnUsers :: Int -> Request a "topAnswerTagsOnUsers" [SE TopTag]

topQuestionTagsOnUsers :: Int -> Request a "topQuestionTagsOnUsers" [SE TopTag]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/me-top-answer-tags</a>
meTopAnswerTags :: Request RequireToken "meTopAnswerTags" [SE TopTag]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/me-top-question-tags</a>
meTopQuestionTags :: Request RequireToken "meTopQuestionTags" [SE TopTag]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/users</a>
users :: Request a "users" [SE User]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/users-by-ids</a>
usersByIds :: [Int] -> Request a "usersByIds" [SE User]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/me</a>
me :: Request RequireToken "me" (SE User)

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/moderators</a>
moderators :: Request a "moderators" [SE User]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/elected-moderators</a>
electedModerators :: Request a "electedModerators" [SE User]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/timeline-on-users</a>
timelineOnUsers :: [Int] -> Request a "timelineOnUsers" [SE UserTimeline]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/me-timeline</a>
meTimeline :: Request RequireToken "meTimeline" [SE UserTimeline]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/write-permissions</a>
writePermissions :: Int -> Request a "writePermissions" [SE WritePermission]

-- | <a>https://api.stackexchange.com/docs/me-write-permissions</a>
meWritePermissions :: Request RequireToken "meWritePermissions" [SE WritePermission]


-- | StackExchange authentication helpers
module Network.StackExchange.Auth

-- | Construct URI at which user should approve app
explicitUserPermission :: Int -> Text -> Request a n r

-- | Request access_token from StackExchange
explicitAccessToken :: Int -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Request a n Text

-- | Construct URI at which user should approve app
implicitUserPermission :: Int -> Text -> Request a n r


-- | Convenience module for the ease of importing
module Network.StackExchange
